features.title: GroupDocs.Conversion features
features.description: Seamlessly convert PDF and office documents to HTML, JPG, PNG, BMP, TIFF, SVG, and many other formats. GroupDocs.Conversion for Node.js via Java API is designed to be easy to use and integrate into your project. It supports all popular document formats with the ability to customize the conversion process.

feature_1.title: Multi-format conversion
feature_1.content: Convert files between various formats, including PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, and more, with ease.

feature_2.title: High-fidelity output
feature_2.content: Preserve the original quality and formatting of documents during the conversion process.

feature_3.title: Converting multiple files
feature_3.content: Convert multiple files and combine them into an archive, simplifying the organization of converted content.

feature_4.title: Multipage document to images
feature_4.content: Convert multipage documents to images page by page, enabling precise control over the transformation process and facilitating image-based document extraction and analysis.

feature_5.title: Customizable settings
feature_5.content: Fine-tune conversion parameters such as resolution, quality, and layout to meet specific requirements.

feature_6.title: Secure processing
feature_6.content: Ensure data privacy with password-protected file conversion options.

feature_7.title: API integration
feature_7.content: Seamlessly integrate the conversion capabilities into your JavaScript applications, making it a seamless part of your workflow.

feature_8.title: Robust conversion
feature_8.content: Ensure reliable and error-free file conversions, guaranteeing the accuracy and integrity of your transformed documents.

feature_9.title: Convert documents from archives
feature_9.content: Extract and convert documents from archives, enabling the transformation of content stored within compressed files.
